entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IntelliCode-suggested completions don't escape keywords properly #74253
  • An instance of analyzer System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.JsonSourceGenerator cannot be created from C:\ Users\sacsharm\.nuget\packages\system.text.json\6.0.0\analyzers\dotnet\roslyn3.11\cs\System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.dll #74252

Closed

  • Automatically rename file while renaming containing type #71465
  • Task List filtering for current project doesn't work as expected #74074
  • Exception during execution of AsyncTests.Imported_AsyncWithEH terminates test process #72437
  • CS8073 | Analyzer says the expression is always false, but I say otherwise #71661
  • Show minimum size of class/struct type as hint when hovering for C# #71804
  • Quick actions and refactoring - generate exception class creates obsolete code #71803
  • Calling non `readonly` method on `ref readonly` variable is allowed and Compiler creates a copy, making changes invisible to the user without any warning #74259
  • Run a single generator at a time #74086
    17.12
  • .AsIncrementalGenerator extension method #74039
    17.12
  • Accessibility issue in document outline window. #73810
    17.11 P3
  • [BUG] When i rename record param, not rename all references #72581
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve performance of SourceText.LineInfo indexer. #74267
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove (already disabled) command handlers related to 'add suppression' menu command. #74266
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix style binding failure in Document Outline #74263
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Reduce closures allocated during invocation of CapturedSymbolReplacement.Replacement #74258
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add tests for VB structure with strings #74257
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix modification of readonly locals through ref fields #74255
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not include collection expression conversion to nullable value type in ClassifyStandardImplicitConversion() #74251
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in SymbolDeclaredCompilationEvent #74250
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove unused legacy-diagnostics-system type (part2). #74265
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused legacy-diagnostics-system type #74264
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Pass along correct VS guid when reporting task list items #74262
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Move settings updates into a queue. #74249
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, Next
  • PR feedback on recent work to sync solutions consistently #74260
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix flaky streaming FAR test #74261
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Dispose various locations using PEReader #74226
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • New generator apis #74127
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, Next
  • Fix style binding failure in Document Outline #74256
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Sync solution contents consistently #72860
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Rename the record parameter when its property get renamed #74168
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid recreating stateset objects continually. #74246
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Add tests for consuming instance extension methods from VB and previous version of C# compiler. #74182
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles

Updated

  • Simplify HostAnalysisScope storage #74055
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Overload Resolution Priority #74190
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Overload Resolution Priority
  • Optimize codegen for collections expression of single spread of `ReadOnlySpan` for collection builder emit strategy #73102
    Area-Compilers, Blocked, Community, untriaged
  • Do not mark 2 first `int` parameters of an interpolated string handler constructor as unused #74064
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Disable targeted notifications in integration tests #73987
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Syntax formatting options #74223
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch implicit span to conversion from type #74232
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add generated semantic search API list #73966
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
